name: Fitness Tracker, Smart Watches for Women Men with 24/7 Heart Rate/Blood Pressure/Blood Oxygen Monitor, Sleep Tracker, Calories&Step Counter, IP68 Waterproof Health Activity Trackers for Android&iPhone
short_description: 💝【Complete Health & Sleep Monitoring】This fitness tracker provides continuous 24/7 monitoring of your heart rate and blood oxygen levels, ensuring you stay on top of your health. The advanced sleep analysis feature tracks different sleep stages, including REM, light, and deep sleep, offering detailed insights and tailored tips to improve your rest. It also includes sedentary reminders and menstrual cycle tracking, helping you maintain a well-rounded and healthy lifestyle.

🏃‍【Multiple Sports Modes & Activity Monitoring】This smartwatch offers a wide range of sports modes, including running, swimming, basketball, football, and more, covering all your favorite activities. As your perfect workout partner, it accurately tracks calories burned, steps taken, distance traveled, and real-time speed. Set personalized fitness goals to boost your workouts and achieve better results more efficiently.

💎【High-Definition Touch Screen & Customizable Watch Face】This smartwatch is designed for both men and women, featuring a 1.47-inch high-definition full-color touch screen made from durable TFT material. Enjoy vivid colors, crisp visuals, and seamless touch interaction. With the GloryFit app, you can choose from over 200 free watch faces or upload your own images to personalize your watch face and make it truly your own.

📲【All-in-One Convenience & Smart Assistant】This smart bracelet is loaded with practical features to simplify your day, including remote camera control, music playback control, step tracking, phone locator, sedentary reminders, menstrual cycle monitoring, and real-time weather updates. With GPS functionality, you can easily track your outdoor workout routes by syncing with your phone’s GPS, making it an ideal companion for a more active, organized lifestyle.

🔋【Extended Battery Life & Wide Compatibility】The D26E ensures you stay connected without hassle, vibrating to alert you about incoming calls and social media notifications, so you never miss important updates—even in meetings or quiet settings. Compatible with both Android and iPhone, it works seamlessly with devices running iOS 9.0+ and Android 4.4+. Plus, the detachable 16mm strap lets you easily switch up the style to suit your mood.

🎁【Perfect Gift & Complete Warranty】With its sleek design and multifunctional features, this fitness watch makes an ideal gift for special occasions like Valentine’s Day, Father’s Day, Mother’s Day, or Grandparents’ Day. Along with your purchase, you’ll receive comprehensive after-sales support to assist with any questions, plus easy return and exchange options for a hassle-free experience.

short_description: Multi-Functional Sports Tracking & 100+ Sport Modes:The fitness watch is equipped with more than 100 sports modes, such as walking, running, swimming, hiking, cycling, mountaineering, yoga, etc. Accurately record all-day activities, this fitness tracker for men and women is waterproof with an IP68 rating, you can safely wear it for swimming, washing hands and showering. However, it is not recommended to use it in hot water (sauna) or sea water (diving).

All Day Health Monitoring:This smartwatch for Android and Iphone (Please note: it requires iOS 9.0 and above and Android 6.0 operating system) is equipped with advanced sensors that provide insights to help you better understand your health and adjust your lifestyle. It not only can monitors your health indicators (heart rate, blood oxygen, sleep), but also records women's menstrual period. It can also automatically monitor your sleep status and provide a comprehensive sleep quality analysis to help you have a better sleep.

Smart Notifications & Bluetooth Calling:Make and receive calls directly from your smartwatch with SMS and calling features through the built-in microphone. Stay connected to SMS and app messages (text, Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter, etc.) and never miss anything important. The AI Voice feature on this smartwatch lets you free your hands to control music playback, check the weather, set alarms, timers, and more by just speaking into your watch (message replies are not supported).

Variety of Watch Faces & Customization Options:This multifunctional smartwatch is equipped with a 1.27-inch round full touch screen, which brings you a refined visual experience and a better appearance experience. You can upload your favorite pictures as the watch face. It contains many daily practical functions that you can choose by yourself, such as message reminders, weather forecasts, music control, stress monitoring, alarm settings, stopwatch, timer, sedentary reminders, breathing guidance, raise to wake, find phone, adjustable brightness, etc.

Worry-free after-sales services:KEEPONFIT smartwatch supports SMS and call functions, and is seamlessly compatible with most iOS 9.0 and above and Android 6.0 and above smartphones (only for smartphones, not for PC, laptop or iPad), plz make sure download the VeryFit App and turn the bluetooth on before you connect it to your phone.Making it a great gift for boyfriends and girlfriends! Track Health Metrics like skin temperature & blood oxygen, plus get daily scores that show how ready you are to work out or how well you’re managing stress. Fitbit is part of the Google family. 1) Requires a Fitbit Premium membership. Premium content recommendations are not available in all locales and may be in English only. 2) Irregular rhythm notifications are only available in select countries and with select Fitbit products; not intended for use by people under 22 years old or with other known arrhythmias. See fitbit.com/irregularrhythm for additional details. 3) Not available in all markets. The SpO2 feature is not intended to diagnose or treat any medical condition or for any other medical purpose. It is intended to help you manage your well-being and keep track of your information. 4) When phone is nearby. 5) Varies with use and other factors. 6) 6 months of Premium for New Premium users only.
